messages.subject: Re: Saitou Fanart at Shinsengumihq.com
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh I saw this up on ebay a while back. I think it was done with india ink... Anyway Ai and co are great people. Everyone should check out their
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "secretary"
<secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
> From AI please click on the image to see the full image
> http://www.shinsengumihq.com/art.htm
> I really love the mixture of lines, texture and care taken in drawing
> Saitou's fingers (I hate drawing hands!)
> Outstanding!

Oh I saw this up on ebay a while back. I think it was done with india
ink... Anyway Ai and co are great people. Everyone should check out
their site/portfolio at www.ai-dax.com

And while we're on the subject of art... Elfwood.com has archived some
great fanart on Saitou too, just use the google search within their
website.

messages.subject: Saitou Fanart at Shinsengumihq.com
messages.msgSnippet: From AI please click on the image to see the full image http://www.shinsengumihq.com/art.htm I really love the mixture of lines, texture and care taken in
messages.messageBody:
From AI please click on the image to see the full image
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/art.htm
I really love the mixture of lines, texture and care taken in drawing
Saitou's fingers (I hate drawing hands!)
Outstanding!
